(7199x243+211)/64 mod 512 = 201. (7199x729+697)/128 mod 256 = 46. (7199x729+697)/256 mod 128 = 23. (7199x2187+2347)/512 mod 64 = 35. (7199x6561+7553)/1024 mod 32 = 21.
